Title: Wedding Unplanned
Writer: Reem Kherici (scenario), Stéphane Kazandjian (scenario), Philippe Lacheau (collaboration), Reem Kherici (original idea)
Actors: Reem Kherici, Nicolas Duvauchelle, Julia Piaton, Sylvie Testud
Plot: When she discovers a wedding planer's business card, Alexia instantly says, "YES" to Mathias unaware that it belongs to his mistress. The groom is now trapped between his bride, and his lover who in charge of his unwanted marriage.
